name: pnp-cancel-all-running-flow-runs
title: Cancel all running flow runs for a flow in an environment
shortDescription: This script will cancel all running flow runs.
longDescription: This script will cancel all running flow runs of a Power Automate flow created in an environment. Pass the Flow environment id and the flow guid as parameter while running the script.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
